title: Interdisciplinary Engineering-English App Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming skills and intermediate or higher English proficiency
context.additional_context: Targeting learners with limited cross-disciplinary collaboration experience as current professionals, in a small-group environment familiar with mobile device usage

learning_goals: Learners can design a mobile app prototype reflecting English language education requirements.
Learners can improve app functionalities by analyzing feedback from experts in other fields.
Learners can propose methods for integrating linguistic elements into the engineering problem-solving process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
